description.name: Description
description.value1: 'withColumn' stage gives the user an ability to perform the following operations with data:
description.value2: 1. Adding a new column to dataframe.
description.value3: 2. Changing value of an existing column.
description.value4: 3. Deriving new column from an existing column.
description.value5: 4. Using conditions to provide column values.

operationType.name: Operation Type
operationType.value1: 'deriveColumn' — create a new column from the existing one.
operationType.value2: 'addConstant' — create a column with constant values.
operationType.value5: 'useConditions' — create a column with values that depend on some conditions.
operationType.value6: 'useWindowFunction' — create a column with values obtained as a result of using the window function.
